content.body: https://blog.cloudflare.com/celebrating-cloudflares-4th-birthday/ they're going to announce free TLS?

Domenic: did the TAG review getUserMedia() yet? Can it recommend authenticated origins? I'm trying to get both geolocation and getUserMedia() to be TLS-only features. Might require some deprecation period for the former.
Domenic: might also be good to point out in the API guide somewhere; filed an issue
would it even be possible for UAs to change geolocation at this point? its been implemented for years
terinjokes: did you get anywhere with the console API?
Is it me or is https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/#nearest-activatable-element weird?
